thread.title: Dozens dead in Kabul suicide attack

title: Dozens dead in Kabul suicide attack
text:
Dozens dead in Kabul suicide attack 11:14am GMT - 00:50 
A suicide bomber blew himself up near a Shi'ite shrine in Kabul on Wednesday, killing at least 26 people and wounding 18, officials said, as the Afghan capital celebrated the Nawruz holiday marking the start of the Persian new year.   
A suicide bomber blew himself up near a Shi'ite shrine in Kabul on Wednesday, killing at least 26 people and wounding 18, officials said, as the Afghan capital celebrated the Nawruz holiday marking the start of the Persian new year.  //reut.rs/2puSct3
